about_the_game:
Ignisia

This is a magical world where majestic dragons live in harmony, protecting their lands from the forces of darkness. Each creature possesses unique abilities and a special purpose, and only together can they maintain the balance in these ancient lands. However, not all the secrets of this world are revealed at once — some of its inhabitants remain hidden in the shadows, waiting for their time.

Immerse yourself in an exciting journey, explore the vast expanses of Ignisia, where magic, adventure, and powerful enemies await you. Discover an amazing world, uncover ancient secrets, and unite with friends to protect it from the looming threat. Perhaps in the future, you’ll find discoveries you never even imagined…

Role-Playing Elements

In Ignisia, every player takes on the role of a unique magical creature — a dragon or other mysterious beings that will be revealed as the world develops. Your character will evolve, gaining new abilities, learning magical arts, and playing their part in defending the ancient lands. Choose your path and determine your own future.

Adventure and Exploration

Discover the vast, open world of Ignisia, filled with mysteries, ancient ruins, and magical artifacts. Dangerous dungeons await you, hiding not only treasures but also ancient evil. Explore territories protected by your allies or venture into unknown lands where enemies may lurk at every turn.

Survival and Combat

The world of Ignisia is full of dangers — both from the forces of nature and hostile creatures. You will need to survive in harsh conditions, gather food, hunt, defend yourself from wicked monsters, and search for resources to craft equipment. Use magic and wit to overcome threats and ensure the survival of your clan.

Social Interactions

The world of Ignisia thrives on player interaction. Form clans, collaborate with other players, forge strong alliances, and defend your lands together. The game includes a communication and cooperation system where you can share resources, complete joint missions.

Crafting and Magical Artifacts

Uncover the ancient secrets of crafting as you create artifacts that empower and strengthen your abilities. Gather rare materials scattered across the land and transform them into magical amulets, potions, and armor that will help you endure any trial. Let each item you forge become more than just a tool—it holds a piece of the world’s power and wisdom, infused by nature itself.

Future Discoveries

The world of Ignisia is filled with many mysteries and hidden possibilities. Over time, new creatures, unknown lands, and other worlds will emerge in the game. Perhaps magical beings will unlock ancient spells, allowing them to change their forms and travel between worlds, opening up new horizons for exploration.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recommended SSD
